Title: Requires the department of labor to provide a document on workplace rights to any minor seeking working papers
Summary: Requires the department of labor to provide a document on workplace rights to any minor seeking working papers and to make such document available in other languages and to school officials who issue working papers.
LawCode: Add ยง137-a, Lab L; amd ยง3215-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the education law, in relation to creating a workplace rights document to be provided to minors seeking employment
